00010 
00011 //  hpux specific config options:
00012 
00013 #define BOOST_PLATFORM "HP-UX"
00014 
00015 // In principle, HP-UX has a nice <stdint.h> under the name <inttypes.h>
00016 // However, it has the following problem:
00017 // Use of UINT32_C(0) results in "0u l" for the preprocessed source
00018 // (verifyable with gcc 2.95.3, assumed for HP aCC)
00019 // #define BOOST_HAS_STDINT_H
00020 
00021 #define BOOST_NO_SWPRINTF 
00022 #define BOOST_NO_CWCTYPE
00023 
00024 #ifdef __GNUC__
00025    // GNU C on HP-UX does not support threads (checked up to gcc 3.3)
00026 #  define BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 // boilerplate code:
00030 #define BOOST_HAS_UNISTD_H
00031 #include <boost/config/posix_features.hpp>
00032 
00033 // the following are always available:
00034 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_GETTIMEOFDAY
00035 #  define BOOST_HAS_GETTIMEOFDAY
00036 #endif
00037 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_SCHED_YIELD
00038 #    define BOOST_HAS_SCHED_YIELD
00039 #endif
00040 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_PTHREAD_MUTEXATTR_SETTYPE
00041 #    define BOOST_HAS_PTHREAD_MUTEXATTR_SETTYPE
00042 #endif
00043 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_NL_TYPES_H
00044 #    define BOOST_HAS_NL_TYPES_H
00045 #endif
00046 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_NANOSLEEP
00047 #    define BOOST_HAS_NANOSLEEP
00048 #endif
00049 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_GETTIMEOFDAY
00050 #    define BOOST_HAS_GETTIMEOFDAY
00051 #endif
00052 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_DIRENT_H
00053 #    define BOOST_HAS_DIRENT_H
00054 #endif
00055 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_CLOCK_GETTIME
00056 #    define BOOST_HAS_CLOCK_GETTIME
00057 #endif
00058 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_SIGACTION
00059 #  define BOOST_HAS_SIGACTION
00060 #endif
